proposal: Hey Bitcoin Emoji community! 🚀 Noticed you're rallying for Bitcoin to get its well-deserved emoji, highlighting its monumental influence on society and tech. With 144 holders on the ETH network, that's quite the statement! Imagine amplifying your movement with our DEX or Lottery tools, where anyone can contribute to your cause. Let's make both our impacts even more emoji-worthy! 🌍💬
